full_summary:
**Appraisal and Progress Advance Validation Management Services**
===========================================================

**RFP No.:** 002532
**Publication Date:** January 31, 2024
**Closing Date:** March 15, 2024, 10:00 AM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** July 4, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** July 3, 2029

**Overview**
------------

The Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) is seeking the services of two vendors to provide appraisal and progress advance validation management services nationally, and one vendor to provide progress advance validation services in the province of Quebec. The services will support the assessment of residential properties, including full, drive-by, and desktop appraisals, as well as progress advance validation inspections.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

* Provide nationwide appraisal services, including full, drive-by, and desktop appraisals
* Conduct progress advance validation inspections nationally
* Provide progress advance validation services for the province of Quebec
* Support CMHC's assessment process, including site visits and property evaluations
* Demonstrate expertise in appraisal and validation services

**RFP Document**
----------------

The RFP document can be downloaded from the [Canada Buy and Sell website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

The RFP is open to bidders who are:

* Canadian companies
* Companies from countries participating in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Companies from countries participating in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**
-----------------------------

The evaluation will be based on a combination of technical merit and price. The highest combined rating will be awarded the contract.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Sara Brady, Contracting Officer
* Telephone: (000) 000-0000
* Email: [sbrady@cmhc-schl.gc.ca](mailto:sbrady@cmhc-schl.gc.ca)

**Attachments**
---------------

The RFP document and attachments can be found on the [Canada Buy and Sell website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). Please note that CMHC will not distribute solicitation documents. Suppliers must download the documents directly from the website. I made sure to reformat the output in markdown format.
